summary.text: Backend‑leaning Full‑Stack / Platform Engineer with 2 years of internship experience building distributed, cloud‑native microservices on AWS. Proficient in Go, TypeScript/Node.js, React, PostgreSQL and container‑driven DevOps (Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD). Designed systems processing 75 k req/min, cut P95 latency 95%, and automated pipelines that slashed deploy times 75%. Passionate about low‑latency data paths, observability, and developer‑centric tooling.

categories.title: Languages
categories.items: Go, TypeScript, JavaScript, Java, Python, SQL, Bash

categories.items: Node.js, Express, Fastify, NestJS, gRPC, REST, GraphQL

categories.title: Cloud & DevOps
categories.items: AWS (S3, EC2, Lambda, RDS, SQS, SNS, CloudWatch), Docker, Kubernetes, Nginx, GitHub Actions, Redis, Kafka

categories.items: Distributed Systems, Microservices, Scalability, CI/CD, TDD, Agile/Scrum

positions.title: Software Development Engineer - I
achievements: Rolled out a new ticket workflow improving customer satisfaction with delayed orders and reducing order cancellations due to delays by 80%.
Migrated internal maps to Google decreasing costs by 25%.

positions.title: Software Development Intern
achievements: Migrated 200+ legacy JS components to TypeScript + Redux in Next.js; decreased build‑time errors 40% and boosted feature velocity 30%.
Authored a Go streaming SDK to pipe multi‑GB ZIP archives directly to AWS S3; reduced transfer latency 65% and halved memory overhead.
Built a GPS ingestion service (≈ 50 k msgs/s) with WebSocket dashboards; improved average delivery ETA 12%.
Refactored RPC layer using goroutines & gRPC batching; slashed P95 latency 95% under 2 k TPS.

experience.title: Backend Developer Intern
achievements: Scaled Strapi‑based ERM to ~1 k RPS; in‑memory caching and query tuning lifted throughput 80%.
Containerised micro‑services with Docker & AWS EC2; trimmed CI/CD duration 75% and cut infra costs 63%.
Restructured React component hierarchy; reduced client re‑renders 40%, keeping First‑Input Delay < 50 ms.

experience.title: Full‑Stack Web Developer Intern
achievements: Engineered Next.js backend for the UP Commercial Tax Dept.; sustained 75 k req/min with JWT + HTTPOnly cookies and WAF rules.
Indexed MSSQL and wrote stored procedures; cut query latency 95% and CPU utilisation 90%.
Automated discrepancy reports with PDFMake & Mammoth; eliminated 60% of manual formatting effort.

projects.name: codeCollab
projects.description: Real‑time code‑sharing IDE (Next.js, WebSockets, CodeMirror); syncs 20+ concurrent users with operational‑transform logic.

projects.name: get‑proctored.ai
projects.description: AI‑powered exam proctoring (TensorFlow, MediaPipe, WebRTC); cut false‑positive rate 30%.

projects.name: TS‑ML Algorithms
projects.description: TypeScript library of classic ML & search algorithms (K‑Means, GA, A*).

projects.name: Pixel Drawing Simulator
projects.description: Canvas tool showcasing Bresenham, flood‑fill, and CRUD export; built for graphics coursework and still a personal favourite.
